Electrodes.name: group_name
Electrodes.description: Name of the ElectrodeGroup this electrode is a part of.

Electrodes.name: electrode_name
Electrodes.description: The unique name of this electrode. Derived from probe contact identifiers. Multiple channels (e.g., AP and LF bands) from the same physical electrode will share the same electrode_name.

Electrodes.name: adc_group
Electrodes.description: The ADC (Analog-to-Digital Converter) index to which each electrode is connected. This hardware configuration determines which channels are sampled simultaneously.

Electrodes.name: adc_sample_order
Electrodes.description: The sampling order index (0-based) of this electrode within its ADC group. Combined with adc_group, this determines the precise temporal offset of each channel's samples.
